title: Instructional Design Based on Multimodal Theory for ICT-Utilized Group Composition Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced program for pre-service teachers conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can create an ICT-based group composition lesson design document applying multimodal theory
Learners can implement a collaborative composition process using smartphone-based music production tools
Learners can develop and evaluate spatial utilization strategies that promote learner interaction

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
